name: Hacktivist
ability: Each night*, you may guess which player is the Enigma, and their phrase. If you guess both correctly (once), you learn a Minion and their character. [+the Enigma]
flavor: When freedom is encrypted, revolution becomes the decryption key.
otherNightReminder: If the Hacktivist correctly guessed the Enigma and their phrase, they learn a minion and their character type.

name: Enigma
ability: You start knowing a phrase that you must say publicly exactly once per day, even if dead. If you are "mad" about being an Outsider, or do not say the phrase exactly once, you might be executed.
flavor: Every word is a key; every silence, a lock
firstNightReminder: Show the Enigma the Enigma Phrase.

name: Phreakker
ability: Each night*, you may guess which player is the Enigma, and their phrase. If you guess both correctly (once), choose 2 players: they die. [+the Enigma]
flavor: Cracking your system was child's play; what follows is my masterpiece, and your doom!
otherNightReminder: If the Phreakker correctly guessed the Enigma and their phrase, they choose 2 players.
